field_delete_mssg: Wannan zai share duk bayanan da aka yiwa rajista don amfanin gona na dindindin a cikin filin ku.
splash_wlc_txt_1: Barka da zuwa FarmSmarter - muna nan don taimaka muku haɓaka tsaba na nasara!
splash_crpclnc_txt_1: Samun mafi kyawun gano cututtukan amfanin gona daga In-App AI Crop-Clinic
splash_crpinfo_txt_1: Samun cikakken bayani game da amfanin gonakinku da mafi kyawun lokutan shuka
splash_chat_txt_1: saduwa da takwarorinsu manoma da raba da koyo daga wani gwaninta
splash_started_txt_1: Samu abubuwa da yawa daga FarmSmarter Web App da Mobile App
anony_user: mai amfani da ba a san shi ba (iyakantaccen damar shiga)
login_txt_1: Barka da dawowa FarmSmarter - mun yi farin cikin sake ganin ku.
login_txt_2: Mu dawo da ku inda kuka tsaya.
new_user_reg: Barka da zuwa FarmSmarter - mun yi farin cikin ganin ku. Bari mu fara.
link_acct: Kuna amfani da FarmSmarter ba tare da suna ba - zaku iya shiga nan
or_log_in: ko shiga cikin asusun da kuke ciki
ent_home_help_mssg_txt: Wannan shi ne keɓaɓɓen dashboard ɗin ku na gona inda zaku iya samun damar bayanai game da, da ƙirƙirar sabbin gonaki. Lokacin da kuka danna gona za ku iya ganin filayen da amfanin gona da aka yiwa rajistar wannan gonar tare da sauran bayanai masu yawa don taimaka muku cin gajiyar rayuwar noma. Ku sani cewa Idan kuka zaɓi goge gonaki, duk bayanan gonar za su ɓace.
ent_home_help_title_txt: Barka da zuwa dashboard ɗin noma
ent_home_no_farm_yet: Ba ku da gona tukuna – yanzu za ku iya ƙara gonar ku ta farko.
prf_stp_scn_1_inf_mssg: Da fatan za a ba mu damar keɓance ƙwarewar ku ta hanyar samar mana da mahimman bayanai game da ku. Ba za a raba keɓaɓɓen keɓaɓɓen keɓaɓɓen keɓaɓɓen keɓaɓɓun keɓaɓɓun ke ba.
prf_stp_wlc: Barka da zuwa FarmSmarter - Bari mu san ku don mu ba da mafi kyawun sabis.
prf_stp_usr_tpe_label: A cikin waɗannan wanne ne ya fi kwatanta ku?
prf_stp_other_usrtp_mssg: wannan nau'in mai amfani yana cikin haɓakawa amma za mu haɗa ku tare da sauran masu amfani da FarmSmarter ta hanyar sabis ɗin taɗi na in-app
prf_stp_other_usrtp_title: nau'in mai amfani da aka zaɓa
prf_stp_scn_2_inf_mssg: Muna fatan yin bikin ku. Da fatan za a zaɓi jinsinku da ranar haihuwa. Dole ne mai amfani ya kasance shekaru 15 zuwa sama don amfani da wannan app
prf_stp_scn_2_inf_title: Saitin bayanin martaba - jinsi da kwanan wata idan haihuwa
prf_stp_nt_eligible: Ba ku cancanci amfani da wannan app ba, dole ne ku kasance 14 da sama
prf_stp_gender_reqd: don Allah zaɓi duka jinsi da ranar haihuwa
prf_stp_prv_pg: Da fatan za a je shafin da ya gabata don zaɓar nau'in mai amfani
prf_stp_gender_label: Zaɓi wanda ya dace da ku
prf_stp_bday_label: Muna so mu yi bikin ranar haihuwar ku!
prf_stp_created: An ƙirƙiri bayanin martabarku cikin nasara
prf_stp_success_text_1: Yana da kyau, bayanin martaba ya cika.
prf_stp_success_text_3: Yanzu zaku iya fara gina gonar ku.
prf_stp_success_text_4: Kuna iya dubawa da shirya bayanin martabarku a kowane lokaci ta danna gunkin bayanin martaba a saman dama na allon.
prf_stp_mail_veri_text_1: Yayi kyau, bayanin martaba ya cika.
prf_stp_mail_veri_text_2: Yanzu kawai muna buƙatar ku tabbatar da adireshin imel ɗin ku ta danna hanyar haɗin da muka aika zuwa yanzu
prf_stp_mail_veri_text_3: Kuna iya dubawa da shirya bayanin martabarku a kowane lokaci ta danna gunkin bayanin martaba a saman dama na allon.
prf_stp_mail_veri_text_4: Muna shirye don maraba da nau'in mai amfani ga al'ummar FarmSmarter.
prf_stp_mail_veri_text_5: A halin yanzu za mu haɗa ku tare da sauran masu amfani da FarmSmarter ta dandalin tattaunawar mu.
prf_stp_mail_veri_resend: Idan imel ɗin bai zo ba kawai danna 'sake aikawa'
farm_stp_scrn_1_info_mssg: Bari mu fara ku ta hanyar ƙirƙirar gonar ku, shigar da sunan gona da matsayin mallakar ku sannan danna gaba
farm_stp_scrn_1_pg_desc: Don kafa gonar ku muna buƙatar ƴan bayanai don tabbatar da cewa mun ba ku shawara mafi kyau.
farm_name_txt: Bari mu fara da ba wa gonar ku suna
own_stat_text: Ta hanyar tabbatar da matsayin mallakar filaye za mu iya tallafa muku wajen yin rajistar ƙasar ku da samun kuɗin kuɗi daga baya.
farm_nm_err: Da fatan za a shigar da ingantaccen suna don gonar
farm_stp_scrn_2_pg_desc: Za a yi amfani da wurin gonar ku lokacin da kuka yi ajiyar kaya ko tarawa ta hanyar FarmSmarter app.
farm_stp_scrn_2_pg_desc_2: Kuna iya nuna wurin gonar ku akan taswira.
farm_saved_mssg: An yi nasarar adana wurin gona.
farm_dash_info_mssg: Dashboard guda ɗaya inda zaku iya lura da duk ayyukan gonaki, yanayin gonar ku da shawarwari daga masananmu kan yadda zaku sami mafi kyau daga gonar ku.
farm_dash_txt: Kuna iya zaɓar gona don ganin abin da ke faruwa.
exp_farm_yield: Yawan amfanin gona da ake tsammani
field_setp_info_mssg: Wannan shine inda zaku iya sanya sunan filin ku kafin ƙirƙirar taswirar filin. Idan ba ku ji a shirye ba tukuna, dawo daga baya kuma za mu kasance a nan!
field_setp_pg_desc: Bari mu fara da ba filin ku suna
map_field_later_desc: FarmSmarter ba zai iya ba ku mafi kyawun bayani game da filin ku ba har sai an tsara shi.
field_setp_scrn_2_info_mssg: Alama filin ku ta hanyar zana polygon kewaye da filin. Bada izinin geo-wuri ko bincika wurinka ta amfani da maɓallan juyawa a kasan shafin. Da zarar an saita wurin ku, danna siffar polygon kusa da gunkin hannu a kusurwar dama ta sama akan mahaɗin taswira. Danna wurin farawa na filin ku don fara zana filin ku. Da zarar an yi taswirar filin kuma kun zagaya filin komawa zuwa wurin farawa, za a zana polygon ta atomatik akan taswira, sannan zaku iya ci gaba don adana filin ku. Don daidaita sifar da aka zana, dole ne ka danna gunkin hannun da ke kan mahaɗin taswira, sannan za a ba ka damar canza yanayin filin ta hanyar jawo kowane batu a kan polygon da aka zana. cire polygon da aka zana abu ne mai sauƙi kamar danna maɓallin 'cire' a kusurwar dama na allo.
field_setp_scrn_2_info_title: gano wuri kuma zana siffar filin ku
field_setp_scrn_2_pg_desc_1: Yanzu kun sanya sunan filin ku bari mu yi taswira don FarmSmarter zai iya ba ku mafi kyawun shawara da lissafin filin ku.
field_setp_scrn_2_pg_desc_2: Fara ta hanyar danna siffar zane a saman kusurwar hagu na taswirar, sannan zaku iya danna taswirar don sanya layuka masu alaƙa a kusa da filin ku. Idan kun makale, danna maɓallin taimako.
harvest_crp_info_mssg: Ta hanyar yin rikodin amfanin gonar ku kamar yadda aka girbe za mu iya taimaka muku don ci gaba da bin diddigin abin da ke cikin filin ku da kuma ba da shawarar sabbin amfanin gona na juyi don kakar gaba. Kyakkyawan ƙididdige yawan amfanin ƙasa yana da kyau, za mu taimaka muku saka idanu kan nasarar filin ku yayin da muke tafiya. Lokacin da kuka ajiye wannan girbin za ku iya zaɓar sabon amfanin gona don shuka a wannan filin. Za a rubuta ranar girbi a matsayin ranar yau
harvest_crp_info_title: Menene jimlar yawan amfanin ku daga wannan amfanin gona?
no_harvest: babu amfanin gona don girbi, da fatan za a koma shafin gida don zaɓar amfanin gona don girbi.
crp_harvested: An girbe amfanin gona cikin nasara
crp_seltion_lst_seasn_info_mssg: Da fatan za a shigar da amfanin gona na baya a cikin akwatin rubutu da ke ƙasa, ba za mu iya ba da mafi kyawun shawarar juyawa ba amma za mu ƙara wannan zuwa zaɓin amfanin gona na gaba da zaran mun iya!
crp_seltion_lst_seasn_info_title: Ba a jera amfanin gona ba?
crp_seltion_lst_seasn_pg_desc_1: FarmSmarter yana amfani da bayanan amfanin gona na baya da kuka bayar don gina shirin shuka don filinku ta amfani da mafi kyawun jujjuya amfanin gona.
crp_seltion_lst_seasn_pg_desc_2: Hakanan zamu iya taimaka muku saka idanu akan yawan aiki da lafiyar ƙasarku ta hanyar kwatanta amfanin gonakin da suka shuɗe.
crp_seltion_lst_seasn_pg_desc_3: Kada ku damu idan ba ku da amfanin gona na ƙarshe, za mu taimaka muku farawa ta hanyar ba da shawarar amfanin gona da ya dace da wurin ku.
crp_seltion_lst_seasn_crp_nt_fnd: Ba a samo amfanin gonar ku ba, ƙara sunan amfanin gonar ku
invalid_yield_val: Da fatan za a shigar da ingantaccen ƙima don Nauyi da Haɓaka
crp_seltion_yield_info_mssg: FarmSmarter zai bin diddigin yawan amfanin gonar ku daga lokaci guda zuwa na gaba.Ta hanyar ba da amfanin ku na ƙarshe don wannan filin za mu iya taimaka muku saka idanu kan lafiyar filin ku na tsawon lokaci. Zaɓi ma'aunin da ya dace don amfanin gonar ku kuma za mu ƙididdige sauran a gare ku!
crp_seltion_yield_info_title: Me yasa ba da yawan amfanin ƙasa na ƙarshe?
harvest_yield: Menene jimlar yawan amfanin gona na wannan amfanin gona a kakar da ta gabata?
no_lst_season_crp_selected: babu amfanin gona da aka zaɓa, da fatan za a koma amfanin gonar kakar da ta gabata
crp_suggt_info_mssg: FarmSmarter zai nuna amfanin gona da za su inganta lafiyar ƙasa ta hanyar jujjuya amfanin gona da juna dangane da tarihin shukar filin da kuka gabata. Da fatan za a zaɓi mafi girman amfanin gona uku don shuka. Babban amfanin gona, amfanin gona na biyu da ƙarin amfanin gona.
crp_suggt_info_title: Shawarwari na amfanin gona suna taimakawa
crp_suggt_desc: FarmSmarter ya ba da shawarar cewa ku shuka har zuwa uku daga cikin waɗannan amfanin gona a cikin filin ku don mafi kyawun damar samun nasara.
no_crp_suggestion: Ba mu da wasu shawarwari a halin yanzu don wannan jujjuyar amfanin gona, da fatan za a zaɓi daga cikakken jerin amfanin gonakin mu.
crp_priority_info_mssg: Da fatan za a zaɓi amfanin gona har uku don shuka a wannan filin. Kuna buƙatar ƙayyade fifiko ga kowane amfanin gona bisa ga mahimmanci. Misali babban amfanin gona naku na iya zama masara kuma zaku iya zaɓar yin cuɗanya da wake kuma ku sami ƙarin amfanin gona kamar zaɓin dasa shuki kamar marigolds don hana aphids.
nw_season_crp_selec_info_mssg: Zaɓi amfanin gona da kuke son shuka don wannan sabon kakar
nw_season_crp_selec_desc: Zaɓi amfanin gona da kuke son girma
plntng_plan_info_mssg: Bari ƙwararrunmu su sake duba tsare-tsaren shuka ku don mu ba da shawarar mafi kyawun tsarin shuka don amfanin gonakin ku
plntng_plan_desc: Zaɓi ranar shuka ku don kowane amfanin gona kuma FarmSmarter zai iya ba ku shawarwari da shawarwari don kowane mataki na girma.
crops_not_selected: Babu amfanin gona da aka zaɓa, da fatan za a koma don zaɓar amfanin gona don sabuwar kakar
crops_selected_success: amfanin gona da aka samar cikin nasara
field_hm_info_mssg: Wannan shafin gidan filin ku ne inda zaku iya sarrafa amfanin gonanku kuma ku sami mafi kyawun shawara daga masana FarmSmarter. Muna ƙididdige yawan amfanin gona bisa ga yankin filin ku da matsakaicin yawan amfanin gona ga yankinku. Idan kuna da amfanin gona da yawa a cikin filin to yawan amfanin gona zai yi ƙasa da yadda aka nuna. Don cikakkun bayanai za ku iya amfani da jagororin amfanin gona don kowane amfanin gona kuma lokacin da kuke shirye don girbi amfanin gonar ku, kawai sanar da mu kuma zamu iya yin rikodin nasarar girbin ku!
field_hm_info_title: Barka da zuwa shafin gida na filin ku
field_hm_tips_mssg: Anan ne zamu iya ba da shawarwari na wucin gadi ... Idan kuna da amfanin gona da yawa a cikin filin to yawan amfanin gona zai ragu daidai gwargwado.
crp_clinic_info_mssg: Asibitin amfanin gona namu na AI yana aiki ta hanyar kallon hotunan da kuke bayarwa na amfanin gona da alamun sa. Mafi kyawun hoton, mafi kyawun ganewar asali zai kasance. Da fatan za a mayar da hankali ga ɓangaren amfanin gona wanda ke nuna alamun bayyanar cututtuka, misali; gaba daya ganye ko yanki na ganyen da ke nuna cutar, gabaɗayan 'ya'yan itace ko kan iri suna nuna alamun. guje wa hotuna da ke nuna tsiro gaba ɗaya ko samun hannaye da yatsu a hanyar shukar ko cuta. Haske mai kyau shima yana taimakawa sosai.
crp_clinic_info_title: Samun mafi kyawun hoto don ganewar asali
crp_clinic_wlc: Sannu, maraba da zuwa asibitin amfanin gona na FarmSmarter. Bari mu dubi matsalar
crp_clinic_choose_crp: zabi amfanin gona da abin ya shafa
crp_clinic_crp_select_info_mssg: Ta hanyar gano amfanin gona da kuka damu da shi zai taimaka wa asibitin amfanin gona da sauri wajen gano ainihin ganewar asali.
crp_clinic_crp_select_info_title: Zaɓi amfanin gona da abin ya shafa
crp_clinic_dnd_info_mssg: ja hoto zuwa sashin da ake aikawa ko danna don loda fayil ɗin hoto na amfanin gona da abin ya shafa. Fayil ɗin da aka karɓa kawai shine jpeg
crp_clinic_dnd_info_title: Hoton amfanin gona ya shafa Drag'n'Drog
crp_clinic_dnd_pg_desc: Yanzu mun san abin da amfanin gona ya shafa za ka iya loda hoto don ganewar asali.
crp_clinic_result_info_mssg: Asibitin amfanin gona namu na AI yana aiki ta hanyar kallon hotunan da kuke bayarwa na amfanin gona da alamun sa. Mafi kyawun hoton, mafi kyawun ganewar asali zai kasance. Dangane da hoton da aka bayar, asibitin amfanin gona namu zai gano guda ɗaya ko fiye da cututtuka a cikin hoton amfanin gona. Za a jera cutar tare da taƙaitaccen bayani game da illolin kamuwa da cuta. Ta danna maɓallin 'nemo ƙarin' za ku sami damar ganin cikakkun bayanai game da kowace cuta, yadda ake magance ta da kuma hanyoyin hana yaduwar cututtuka. Idan gano cutar ta yi kama da kuskure, zaku iya ziyartar ɗakin karatu na cutar mu kuma bincika cututtukan da suka zama ruwan dare don amfanin gona.
thanks_info_mssg: Idan ganewar asali ya yi kuskure za mu yi rubutu da sake dubawa. A halin yanzu kuna iya ganin cikakken jerin cututtuka anan:
go_to_disease_lib: je zuwa ɗakin karatu na cututtuka
crp_doc_wel_mssg: Barka da zuwa asibitin amfanin gona na FarmSmarter, bari mu kalli matsalar
crp_doc_drg_n_drp_mssg: Danna nan don loda ko ja da sauke hoton amfanin gona mara lafiya (PNG, JPG, JPEG)
drg_n_drg_file_type: nau'in fayil ɗin ba a karɓa ba
drg_n_drg_mul_file_type: Ba a karɓi loda fayil da yawa ba
crp_disease_loader: Ana ci gaba da gano cututtukan amfanin gona
crp_disease_err_loader: Babu sabis a halin yanzu, da fatan za a sake gwadawa daga baya
drn_n_drp_crp_fml: ja da sauke hoton iyali nan ko danna don zaɓar fayil ɗin hoto (.PNG, .JPG ko .JPEG)
drn_n_drp_crp_disease: ja da sauke hoton cutar amfanin gona nan ko danna don zaɓar fayil ɗin hoto (.PNG, .JPG ko .JPEG)
chat_wlc_mss: Barka da zuwa farmSmarter Community hira
chat_wlc_desc: Ƙirƙiri sunan mai amfani don farawa
chats_info_mssg: Wannan shine inda zaku iya haɗawa da manoma, masu samar da kayan aikin gona, masu ba da kuɗi da sauran membobin al'umma don raba ra'ayoyi, samun shawara da gina ƙaƙƙarfan al'ummar FarmSmarter.
mssg_history_unavailable: babu tarihin saƙo a wannan lokacin
wlc_to_chat: Barka da zuwa FarmSmarter Chat App

crp_inf_mssg: Samun bayanai game da amfanin gona da cututtukan da ke shafar amfanin gona.
crp_detail_info_mssg: Samun cikakken bayani game da wannan amfanin gona
no_info_for_selec_lang: Babu bayanai don harshen da aka zaɓa, da fatan za a sake duba baya.
annony_crp_inf_mssg: Da fatan za a shiga / yi rajista don samun cikakken damar yin amfani da bayanin amfanin gona
home_anonymous_msg: Har yanzu ba a shiga cikin asusun ba. Da fatan za a shiga ko ku yi rajista don gina bayanan gonaki.
chat_anonymous_msg: Har yanzu ba a shiga cikin asusun ba. Da fatan za a shiga ko kuma ku yi rajista don yin taɗi da abokan aikin gona.
weather_anonymous_msg: Har yanzu ba a shiga cikin asusun ba. Da fatan za a shiga ko yi rajista don samun cikakken bayanin yanayi.
fallback_anonymous_mggs: Har yanzu ba a shiga cikin asusun ba. Da fatan za a shiga ko ku yi rajista don samun cikakken shiga.
disease_detail_info_mssg: Samun cikakken bayani game da wannan cuta
grwth_stg_fr_infe: matakan girma don kamuwa da cuta
weather_report_failed: ku! yanayi ya kasa ɗauka, sake gwadawa
settings_info_mssg: Sabunta zaɓin yaren ku kuma keɓance ƙwarewar ku
delete_accunt_desc: Ana share asusun ku? Ka tabbata kana son share asusunka?
lang_descp: Zaɓi harshen da kuka fi so
delete_acct_prompt_mssg: Share asusun ku na FarmSmarter zai cire duk bayanan da aka adana, kun tabbata kuna son ci gaba?
usr_profile_inf_mssg: Duba ku sabunta bayanin martabar mai amfani don samun ƙwarewa mafi kyau ta amfani da FarmSmarter
prf_nt_fnd_mssg: Ba a samo bayanin martabarku ba, da fatan za a ƙirƙiri bayanin martaba kafin a ci gaba.
usr_profile_pg_desc_1: Taya murna, bayanin martabar ku yana da kyau!
usr_profile_pg_desc_2: *Waɗannan abubuwan suna bayyane ga sauran masu amfani.
update_success: An yi nasarar sabunta bayanan martabarka
prf_img_upload_failed: hoton bayanin martaba ya kasa lodawa
multiple_upload_reject: ba a karɓar fayiloli da yawa
no_item_found: Babu wani abu da aka samu
otp_mssg: An aika lambar zuwa lambar wayar ku, shigar da lambar da ke ƙasa don tabbatarwa
phone_linked: an sami nasarar ƙara lambar waya azaman zaɓin shiga na biyu
settings_link_opt_lbl_txt: Saita hanyar shiga ta biyu don ba da damar tantancewa mara kyau
error_404: Kuskure 404, BA a samo Shafi ba
newtork_err_mssg: da alama an katse hanyar sadarwar ku, da fatan za a sake gwadawa
server_network_mssg: da alama ba za ku iya haɗi zuwa FarmSmarter ba, da fatan za a sake gwadawa
